required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate ALN-AGT01 in Patients With Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Single Dose and Active Comparator-Controlled Multiple Dose Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of Subcutaneously Administered ALN-AGT01 in Patients With Hypertension

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetic (PK), and pharmacodynamic (PD) effects of subcutaneous (SC) ALN-AGT01 in participants with hypertension. The study will be conducted in 5 parts: Part A will be a single ascending dose (SAD) phase in hypertensive participants, Part B will be a single dose (SD) phase in hypertensive participants with controlled salt intake, Part C will be a multiple dose (MD) phase in hypertensive participants, Part D will be a MD phase in hypertensive participants who are obese, and Part E will be an open-label SD phase with co-administration of irbesartan in hypertensive patients.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Parts A, B and E: each up to approximately 12 months; Parts C and D: each up to approximately 18 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Blood Angiotensinogen (AGT) Level
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Parts A, B and E: each up to approximately 12 months; Parts C and D: each up to approximately 18 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of ALN-AGT01 and of Potential Metabolites
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Parts A, B and E: Up to Day 15; Parts C and D: Up to Day 99

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve (AUC) of ALN-AGT01 and of Potential Metabolites
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Parts A, B and E: Up to Day 15; Parts C and D: Up to Day 99

arm_group.description: Participants will be administered a single dose of ALN-AGT01.
Participants will be administered a single dose of ALN-AGT01-matching placebo.
Participants with controlled salt intake will be administered a single dose of ALN-AGT01.
Participants with controlled salt intake will be administered a single dose of ALN-AGT01-matching placebo.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part C: MD: ALN-AGT01 + Irbesartan-Matching Placebo
arm_group.description: Participants will be administered multiple doses of ALN-AGT01 and irbesartan-matching placebo.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part C: MD: ALN-AGT01-Matching Placebo + Irbesartan
arm_group.description: Participants will be administered multiple doses of ALN-AGT01-matching placebo and irbesartan.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part D: MD: ALN-AGT01 + Irbesartan-Matching Placebo
arm_group.description: Participants, who are obese, will be administered multiple doses of ALN-AGT01 and irbesartan-matching placebo.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part D: MD: ALN-AGT01-Matching Placebo + Irbesartan
arm_group.description: Participants, who are obese, will be administered multiple doses of ALN-AGT01-matching placebo and irbesartan.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part E: Open Label: ALN-AGT01 + Irbesartan
arm_group.description: Participants will be administered a single dose of ALN-AGT01 and multiple doses of irbesartan.

intervention.description: ALN-AGT01 will be administered by subcutaneous (SC) injection.
intervention.arm_group_label: Part C: MD: ALN-AGT01 + Irbesartan-Matching Placebo
Part D: MD: ALN-AGT01 + Irbesartan-Matching Placebo
Part E: Open Label: ALN-AGT01 + Irbesartan

intervention.description: Normal saline (0.9% NaCl) matching volume of ALN-AGT01 doses will be administered SC.
intervention.arm_group_label: Part C: MD: ALN-AGT01-Matching Placebo + Irbesartan
Part D: MD: ALN-AGT01-Matching Placebo + Irbesartan
Part C: MD: ALN-AGT01-Matching Placebo + Irbesartan
Part D: MD: ALN-AGT01-Matching Placebo + Irbesartan
Part E: Open Label: ALN-AGT01 + Irbesartan

intervention.description: Irbesartan-matching placebo will be administered orally.
intervention.arm_group_label: Part C: MD: ALN-AGT01 + Irbesartan-Matching Placebo
Part D: MD: ALN-AGT01 + Irbesartan-Matching Placebo

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Has mild to moderate hypertension with mean sitting systolic blood pressure (SBP) of >130 and ≤165 mmHg without hypertensive medication for Parts A,B, C and D, and >135 and ≤165 mmHg without hypertensive medication for Part E
- Parts A, B, and C: Has body mass index (BMI) ≥18 and ≤35 kg/m^2; Part D: Has BMI >30 and ≤50 kg/m^2; Part E: Has BMI ≥18 kg/m^2 and ≤50 kg/m^2
- Has a normal 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG)
- Is a nonsmoker
Exclusion Criteria:
- Has secondary hypertension
- Has orthostatic hypotension
- Has estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) of <60 mL/min/1.73m^2
- Recently received an investigational agent
- Has diabetes mellitus
- Has history of any cardiovascular event
- Has history of intolerance to SC injection(s)
